Description: Dramatic element (used for items of the liturgical drama that are not otherwise rubricked)
Hymn verse (in future, please use the "H" hymn genre with verses within the same record separated by | lines)
Interspersed, additional verse in Old-Hispanic hymn
Versus ad repetendum for the introit
Invitatory psalm (when written out and notated)
Laudes in the matutinum service (Old Hispanic)
Verse for the Laudes in the matutinum service
Verse of a Mass chant (a generic code used in the earliest Cantus indices)
Mass chant (a generic code used in the earliest Cantus indices)
Mass Ordinary (a generic code used in the earliest Cantus indices)
Miscellaneous (a generic code used in the earliest Cantus indices)
